ygData.subject: Mana song bug? J. M. please answer
ygData.msgSnippet: ... use ... when ... Is this true?  I am often with groups that include 3 or more casters, so power-medding during battle is common, and they have me play mana
ygData.messageBody:
Garramone writes:
>There is a bug that a spell cast while you are playing the mana song can
use
>a whole lot more mana than usual (one whole bubble of mana on a spell that
>normally takes one quarter or less). Therefore it is not a good idea to
>play the mana song during combat, unless the special case you mentioned
when
>all casters are OOM. otherwise during combat it can actually be
>detrimental.

Is this true? I am often with groups that include 3 or more casters, so
power-medding during battle is common, and they have me play mana song
constantly. None of them have mentioned anything like this.

- Windsong Wanderer, bard on Solusek Ro
